channel.name: Streaming File Operations
channel.description:
This channel shows some short examples of using file APIs in Lua which allow files to be read or written to in small chunks.
This can be useful if you are processing large batches of data.
Rather than reading everything into memory at once you can read smaller sections at time. This can dramatically improve the performance of some interfaces.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/streaming-file-operations
